xwikidoc.title: GitLabApp Translations
xwikidoc.content: gitlab.title=GitLab Commit Application gitlab.description=Welcome to the GitLab Commit App. You can configure GitLab repositories to connect to your wiki and commit your wiki content in these repositories. gitlab.currentconfigs.title=Current GitLab Configs gitlab.currentconfigs.noconfigs=There are currently no configs created gitlab.createnewconfig=Create New GitLab Config gitlab.createnewimport.error.titlemissing=A title is needed when creating an GitLab config gitlab.configsheet.title=GitLab Repository Configuration gitlab.configsheet.compare.title=Differences for gitlab.configsheet.viewdiff=View Diff gitlab.configsheet.viewdiffunformatted=View Diff Unformatted gitlab.configsheet.committingpages=Committing the following pages gitlab.configsheet.committsuccessfull=Commit finished successfully gitlab.configsheet.backtolist=Back to List of pages to commit gitlab.configsheet.backtocustom=Back to Custom list of pages to commit gitlab.configsheet.confirmcommittingpage=Please confirm commiting the following page(s) gitlab.configsheet.custom.spacelist=Space List (separated by commas) gitlab.configsheet.custom.space=Space
